items.name: Berio's Sequenza VII
items.description: An app to help oboists practice Berio's Sequenza VII.

items.name: Crossfix
items.description: A crossword puzzle assistant which helps you work out anagrams.

items.name: Crossfix Lite
items.description: A free version of Crossfix which limits you to 3 anagrams per day.

items.name: Mark Time
items.description: An app for celestial navigation, that records an accurate time stamp and optional photo for each sextant reading.

items.name: What Is My Speed?
items.description: An app to display your speed with optional speed limit warnings and full location data.
